entry.title: New release for Planka: v1.23.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: Support for service annotations in Helm (#903)
  • feat: Ability to disable SMTP certificate verification

New Contributors

  • @JoeKer1 made their first contribution in https://github.com/plankanban/planka/pull/903

Full Changelog: https://github.com/plankanban/planka/compare/v1.23.0...v1.23.1

entry.title: New release for Planka: v1.23.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: Ability to upload multiple attachments at once
  • feat: Add British English translation

Full Changelog: https://github.com/plankanban/planka/compare/v1.23.1...v1.23.2
